text:
Dusta.
Sanzu hanya ingin membersihkan noda sisa babi penghianat dari tubuh mungil Takemichi, dengan sedikit perawatan ia pasti bisa disulap menjadi rupawan.
Takemichi meringis kesakitan kala jari ramping Sanzu masuki liang buat luka kembali terbuka. Air mata mengalir basahi jas milik Sanzu yang kini kotor dengan darah sang ayah, teriakan keluar dari bilah bibir bagai aphrodisiac buat Sanzu makin bersemangat.
“Sakit! hentikan!”
“Ga usah belaga suci, perek sialan”
Sanzu keluarkan jarinya, tubuh ringan bagai kertas ia hempas sejajar dengan penis keras menegang miliknya. Penis ia hujam buat Takemichi menangis histeris, liang penuh luka kembali dipaksa menerima benda keras yang tak seharusnya masuk.
Tonjolan terlihat jelas dari balik perut kurus bak tulang berbalut kulit buat Sanzu terpukau melihatnya.
“Tubuhmu sangat kurus sampai penis kakak terlihat.”
“Hiks… Sakit kak— Kumohon henti— Akh!”
trans:
Deceit.
Sanzu merely wishes to cleanse the remnants of the traitorous swine from Takemichi's tiny body, with a little touch of care she could undoubtedly be transformed into a beauty.
Takemichi grimaced in pain as Sanzu's slender finger delved into the wound, making the wound open again. Tears streamed down Sanzu's suit which was now stained with the father's blood, screams escaped from her lips like an aphrodisiac making Sanzu even more excited.
“It hurts! Stop!”
“There's no need to play the saint, you filthy whore”
Sanzu took out his fingers, he smashed the light-as-paper body parallel to his rigid, throbbing penis. The thrust of his penis made Takemichi cry hysterically, the wound-ridden hole was once again forced to accept a hard object that should never have entered.
The bulge was clearly visible beneath the thin, bone-like belly wrapped in skin leaving Sanzu in awe at the sight.
"Your body is so thin that my penis is visible."
"Hiks... It hurts— Please stop— Akh!"
